title: 目標達成の後に・Open Horizon

text.jpText:
ファインモーションはトレーナーに、
『エリザベス女王杯』に出たいと話す。
中継を観戦して以来、気になっていたようだ。
text.enText:
Fine Motion tells her trainer that she wants 
to run in the "Queen Elizabeth Cup. Ever 
since she watched the live broadcast of the 
race, she has been curious about it.

text.jpText:
誇り高いこのレースで、祖国への感謝を
伝えたい――トレーナーは彼女の熱意に応え
大目標を『エリザベス女王杯』に設定した。
text.enText:
Her trainer responded to her enthusiasm and 
set the "Queen Elizabeth Cup" as her major 
goal. Her trainer, in response to her 
enthusiasm, set the "Queen Elizabeth Cup" as 
her major goal.

text.jpText:
2人はそこへ至るための道を話し合う。
結果『桜花賞』『オークス』『秋華賞』から
成るトリプルティアラ路線へ進むと決まった。
text.enText:
The two discuss the path to get there. As a 
result, they decided to follow the Triple 
Tiara route, which consists of the 
Sakurabana-sho, Oaks, and Shuka-sho. The 
result was that they decided to go on to the 
Triple Tiara route, which consists of the

coloredText.enText:
Japan's National Football Championship (held 
annually by the Japan Football Association)

Fall Flowers Festival (national holiday held 
from 1868 to 1948)

text.jpText:
ファインモーションは大きな舞台での景色が
自分に何をもたらすのか、期待を膨らませる。
まずは初戦『桜花賞』を目指す……！
text.enText:
Fine Motion has high hopes for what the 
scenery on the big stage will bring to her. 
First, she's aiming for her first race, the 
"Sakurabana-sho" ……!
